scripts.supa:typegen: bash -c 'source ./scripts/set_env.sh && npx supabase gen types typescript --db-url "$SUPABASE_DB_URL" > models/supaservice.types.ts'
scripts.supa:check:
bash -c 'source ./scripts/set_env.sh && echo "App Link: $NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL
DB URL: $SUPABASE_DB_URL" && npx supabase status'
scripts.supa:db:backup: bash -c 'source ./scripts/set_env.sh && source ./scripts/prepare_backup.sh "$1" && npx supabase db dump --data-only -f "supabase/backups/$BACKUP_FILENAME" --db-url "$SUPABASE_DB_URL"' --
scripts.supa:migration: bash -c 'source ./scripts/set_env.sh && pnpm dlx supabase migration list --db-url "$SUPABASE_DB_URL"'
scripts.supa:migration:pull: bash -c 'source ./scripts/set_env.sh && pnpm dlx supabase db diff -f "${1:-diff}" --db-url "$SUPABASE_DB_URL"' --
scripts.supa:migration:push: bash -c 'source ./scripts/set_env.sh && pnpm dlx supabase db push --db-url "$SUPABASE_DB_URL" --debug --include-all'
